name: Gran Teft Unicycle
description:
Only One wheel can give you enougth street cred.

Stay balances, kill those nasty East coast gangsta cats and collect the 2PAC tokens.

Peace !

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2019 with love

Controls:

  • Move Left : A, Q, Left Arrow, Left Joystick
  • Move Right: D, Right Arrow, Left Joystick
  • Shoot: E, Left Mouse Button, Controller A button, Controller X button
  • Quit: Esc, select
  • Restart when dead: R, Start
